virtual int doAction (Vector &action)=0

Detailed Description

Container for any RL problem we care to define. We simply have to define the dimensionality of actions, a reward function, a way to get observationsk, and a way to do actions.

virtual int libpg::Simulator::getMaxEpisodeLength (  )  [virtual]

Maximum episode length in steps. For planning mode. Only used by GOALPomdp at the moment.

Reimplemented in Sequence, SP38::SP38PGSimulator, ThreeState, MySimulator, and ThreeState.

virtual int libpg::Simulator::getObsCols (  )  [pure virtual]

Get the number of columns in the observation matrix Typically use multiple columns to provide a different observation to each agent, so the number of columns is the same as getAgents()

virtual void libpg::Simulator::getReward ( Vector &  rewards  )  [pure virtual]

Just return the reward associated with the most recent state achieved.

Parameters:
vector of rewards. The vector has getAgents() dimensionality In non-local reward mode this vector will just be averaged.

Implemented in Cassandra, GridSim, FunctionSim, Sequence, SP38::SP38PGSimulator, ThreeState, MySimulator, and ThreeState.

virtual void libpg::Simulator::getObservation ( Observation &  obs  )  [pure virtual]

Return the observation of the current state. Could be a scalar, vector, or matrix, so we left the type as Matrix

possibly stochastic observation of the current state

virtual int libpg::Simulator::doAction ( Vector &  action  )  [pure virtual]

Do action issued by a controller

Returns:
vector of actions, typically just a scalar which is cast to an int, but it there are multiple agents it will be a vector of actions for each agent.
Parameters:
vector that describes the action to perform.
